item.title: CVE-2024-32453|2024-04-15T06:27:34.968Z -- poeditor -- poeditor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POEditor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects POEditor: from n/a through 0.9.8.
